import sys

u = platform.uname()

print(f'Node:      {u.node}')

print(f'Machine:   {u.machine}')
print(f'Processor: {u.processor}')

#!/usr/bin/env python3
import os
import resource

usage = resource.getrusage(resource.RUSAGE_SELF)
print(f'CPU count:        {os.cpu_count()}')
print(f'Max RSS (KB):     {usage.ru_maxrss}')
print(f'User time (s):    {usage.ru_utime:.4f}')
print(f'System time (s):  {usage.ru_stime:.4f}')
